short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Computes and displays total count for downloads and prints for models on MakerWorld's profile pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MWPointTracker allows you to quickly see how many total downloads each of your models has reached without having to mentally compute 'downloads + prints * 2'. MWPointTracker shows a bar indicating progress towards the next point award. Holding the mouse over the progress bar displays the progress numerically.

Version 0.7: Updated css class names to match the new 'mw' naming convention on MakerWorld's page.
Version 0.8: Point stat and progress bar are also shown on the model page.
